summary: Provides a pipeline that runs the Stable Diffusion XL model with K‑diffusion samplers to generate images from textual prompts, managing model loading, configuration handling, and inference execution.
business_intent: Allow developers and end‑users to quickly produce high‑quality AI‑generated images using the latest Stable Diffusion XL architecture with flexible K‑diffusion sampling, simplifying initialization from configuration files or pretrained checkpoints.
